responses.title: The self-righteous shall choke on their sanctimony.
From the hell of hells I come.
The marauders road is ever long.
First blood, hmm heh hmm hm.
The first sacrifice has been paid.
Tempt my blade why don't you.
Stop hitting yourself, stop hitting your... stop hitting yourself.
Fear what you will never understand.
Izhai irush ahm'ucha. (They fell ill a long time ago.)
Ahm'sol miskath Ozh. (All hope fails me.)
My gaze is the measure of all things.
Power corrupts, but I was already corrupt.
By my increase shall my enemies know death.
Well, this unlevels the playing field.
Now falls the dogma of the self-righteous!
In war, gods favor the sharper blade.
I give my blade; you give your life.
I open your throat to close your eyes.
The wages of sin, paid in full.
The death of a thousand cuts, was unnecessary.
Let's bare your soul, shall we?
A wise blade takes a fool's life.
Ahm'izhai icha lofath. (All of them will [?].)
You sleep to dream; die to live again.
He that burns, burns no more.
Your tongue is the only meat you'll eat.
The blood of martyrs bleeds just as red.
You'll imprison no more in your ring of trees.
Healer, your hypocrisy knew no bounds.
Chen, I wearied of your sanctimony.
Chen, your beloved creatures will feast on your corpse.
Stillness is beauty; I render you beautiful.
I was the devil on your shoulder.
Little keen, consider yourself hell bent.
Now you're the very soul of discretion.
Shadow Fiend, to lowest hell with you.
For a thing named Undying, you look awfully dead.
I stalk all hours, not just the night.
Necrophos, your disease has run its course.
Medusa, I always knew you'd turn tail.
You were quick Windranger, but not quick enough.
Did you see that coming, Oracle?
Spirit, you ran your mouth; I ran you through.
Not so glib now, eh Storm Spirit?
Timbersaw, I put an end to your madness.
I return you to the Earth from whence you came.
Wyvern, Winter has come to your soul.
You've been to hell and back, and back to hell, and back, and now back again.
Stay in hell this time, would you?
Warlock, now the mages can summon you from hell.
Warlock, you've summoned your last demon.
Your voice captivates no more, Siren.
I ruled in the hell of Foulfell. Why would you think I'd bow to you?
Warlock, you've enslaved your last demon.
You are no king of mine.
Timbersaw, please shut up about the trees. Seriously, you need help.
Hey Timbersaw, look out, a tree! Heyah, heh, hah.
I'm always glad to have a dragon by my side.
Timbersaw, what the hell is wrong with you anyway.
Techies. It has to be Techies.
Skywrath, what a fine demon you would make.
Come Doom, these fools have hell to pay.
Doom, let's swing wide the gates of hell.
Lion, you are no demon, though you bear the mark.
Spirit Breaker, your horns are worthy of a demon.
Warlock, I know your demon well.
Shadow Fiend, let's give them hell.
Chaos Knight, let's ride them down.
Clinkz, our horns shall run them through.
Come Centaur, our horns shall run them through.
Come Centaur, this lane will run red.
I'm every demon's worst nightmare, but I'm your best friend.
Phoenix, what kind of being are you?
A lost life, a found coin.
Gold is mined easiest from corpses.
The road to hell lies open.
I go where angels fear to tread.
A natural death for a demon.
A demon's rage is stronger than death.
My final end was not so final.
This form reveals but a fraction of my soul's malignancy!
You can't keep a demon down!
Heaven is a locked box, but hell is a sieve
My journey is far from over.
Oh, they're gonna hate me for this.
Heart of Tarrasque. Heart and soul.
Mask of Madness. Yet another way to steal their lives.
Soul Ring for the Soul Keeper.
Desolator. With this blade, I will lay their souls to waste.
Heaven's Halberd. The irony does not escape me.
This blade rings true, while sharp tongues lie.
I'll kill my own before I let you have them.
Their lives mean nothing to me.
Gold's father is Earth, his betrayer steel.
Only gold fears not the furnace.
Small thieves hang; great ones prosper.
I'll invest this in some bribery.
A true demon can never die.
Quick feet to match my temper.
Fight me now, if you dare.
The straight road loses no travelers.

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: This one is all over but the lamentation.
The prison walls of Foulfell were no match for my rage.
Foulfell has fallen, and the terror has been unleashed.
Back to the hell of hell.
